The Office of the Vice-Chancellor provides administrative services and executive secretarial functions to the Vice-Chancellor in carrying out his official duties. The office provides a focal point for the coordination and integration that synergises the University\u2019s operations, subsequently supporting the Vice-Chancellor on the full range of strategic, policy, and managerial matters.

Professor Datuk Ts. Dr. Shahrin bin Sahib @ Sahibuddin, FASc<\/strong>
Vice-Chancellor, Universiti Teknologi MARA
Email: vc@uitm.edu.my
Tel: 603-5544 2222 | Faks: 603-5544 2030

Office Hours <\/strong>
Monday - Thursday: 8.00 am - 1.00 pm, 2.00 pm - 5.00 pm
Friday: 8.00 am - 12.15 pm, 2.45 pm - 5.00 pm
Closed on Saturdays, Sundays & Public
